name: BrainyJoy
description:
Brainy Joy is a new genre of puzzle game.

The game consist of nodes connected with roads with sometimes goodies or demons on these nodes

sometimes the player can build or remove roads.

With the exception of sorcerers who travels across the roads in order to kill the player, all the foes (monsters) are statics.

The goal of the game is to kill all statics monsters on all maps.
